title: Hour 3 - Bob Costas (05-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bob Costas (05-01-20)
description:
Dan Patrick talks about the NCAA allowing student-athletes to profit off the personal use of their name, image and likeness, and questions when it is okay for colleges to re-open their campuses. Guest: Bob Costas

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
